attributes.action: Standard drug testing for all mps
attributes.additional_details:
It cant be one rule for them and another for us. 
Vice article https://www.vice.com/amp/en_uk/article/43jp9d/we-found-evidence-of-cocaine-use-in-the-house-of-commons

People all over the uk  have to be tested for work and I dont see why mps dont. If you have nothing to hide then you have nothing to fear
attributes.background: With the information about mps past drug abuse coming out and with the new information from vice that out of 9 secure places in and around mp exclusive areas 4 came back positive for cocaine. I feel standard testing should be brought in with instant dismissal for anyone avoiding or failing the test

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264011
